message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your turn Alice. I'm feeling generous, but let's make it snappy. Time is money, literally!
Come on, Bob, the money is losing value for you! Let's settle on 58-42.
This is getting ridiculous, Alice. Another round wasted, more value gone. I'm holding firm at this offer, take it or leave it.
You're losing value fast, Bob! I'm being generous with 57-43. Take it before it's too late!
